alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 10 at 1:02AM PDT until May 10 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sustained westerly winds 25 to 35 mph, with gusts near 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Kern County desert. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Blowing dust may reduce visibilities at times. Travel will be difficult, particularly for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 14, U.S. Highway 395, Highway 178 below Walker Pass, and Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes
